title: Yotsuba&!, Vol. 10
description: English Version: Yotsuba loooooves playing games! When Daddy's the counter in hide-and-seek, he can never find Yotsuba, 'cos I'm such a good hider! And when we go to the park, Yotsuba's the bestest at swing-tag-shoe-races. Daddy says Yotsuba's making up the rules as we go along, but Yotsuba thinks Daddy's just a sour loser. But maybe Yotsuba will let him win once in a while..."Sementara ayahnya bekerja, Yotsuba bermain rumah-rumahan di bawah mejanya. Kemudian, terinspirasi oleh buku bergambar, Yotsuba pun mulai belajar bagaimana cara membuat pancake. Kisah-kisah lucu dan menyenangkan dalam keseharian Yotsuba!"
author: Kiyohiko Azuma
